verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Praise Him, praise Him,
Praise Him in the morning.
Praise Him at the noontime.
Praise Him, praise Him,
Praise Him when the sun goes down.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Love Him, etc.
Serve Him, etc.
Jesus, etc.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Alabale, alabale, alabale en la ma√±ana.
Alabale al mediodia.
Alabale, alabele, alabale al caer el sol.
